title: Front Mudguard - Removal

body.body: Warning - General - Stabilise Motorcycle - including DO NOT support on non integral parts
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall resulting in motorcycle damage, serious injury or death.
Front Mudguard Removal - CB7; CN7, CS7, CE7
Note the routing of the brake hoses, the cable for the front wheel speed sensor and the hose clip positions for the installation procedure.
Detach the front brake hose from the clip on the front mudguard.
Detach the cable for the front wheel speed sensor from the clip on the front mudguard.
Remove and discard the two rear fixings.
Support the front mudguard and remove the four front fixings. Carefully remove the mudguard towards the front of the motorcycle.
